name: Quetzal Heist
description:
WELCOME TO THE JUNGLE!

Maybe you should not have stolen the sacred relic of an ancient Aztec god, now he's mad! And you're stuck in his trap. Find the exit at the middle of the map and go down the layers of the temple. Each layer is filled with enemies, but it seems the relic has some hidden tricks that can help you. Don't use it for too long, though. Bad things can happen to those who use Quetzalcoatl's power... 

Have fun!

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D moves the player
  • Space uses the relic

DEVELOPERS:

  • Anderson Luiz Bazzotti Santos
  • Carlos Henrique Mendonça Peixoto
  • Bruno Rafael Ribeiro Lemes
  • Christian Daniel Guimenes
  • Eduardo de Freitas Tonelli

  • Matheus Carvalho Correia

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING OUR GAME!
